Review.Titre: If I could give zero stars I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give zero stars I would. We ordered a miner from this company and the manufacture was delayed - completely understand that is outside of their control. However, the way they handled that delay is unreal to me. I spent hours trying to get ahold of someone for updates across multiple days. When I would get updates it would be to tell me to be patient and that they couldn't give me a refund even though the item was delayed by almost a year. Finally, I found out they had the item, but hadn't bothered to ship it. Then arranging shipping took another 2 weeks of me calling. Their employees are rude and unhelpful and there is zero accountability if something goes wrong. Buy from a more reputable dealer. I also noticed that they like to claim bad reviews were paid for by a competitor or not actual customers. That's a cute trick.
Arrogant seller - Don’t take time to understand the client needs. Always have a story that doesn’t concern my questions. Very bad seller .

Review.Titre: The company does not fulfill its Liabilities ! Scam?
Review.Contenu: I bought an ASIC Bitmain KS3 on May 19 for $23,535 and paid with USDT, but I didn’t receive the ASIC. I want to warn everyone that as soon as the money is sent, interest disappears, and communication becomes more difficult.  First they promised September 27, then October 5. I never received a tracking number or waybill, today is November 21th. But now they are silent, the support is silent, Sabrina Monti is silent, James is silent! I wrote dozens of appeals, but everyone is silent!  In the online account the status is “in progress” but there is no answer. I don't know if they are scammers or not...   Be careful with this company! If something changes, I will change the review and let you know what has changed...  I gave an honest review, you can rest assuredUpdate:The company claims that the parcel is at customs, but 3 weeks have already passed. The company did not provide any tracking number or package number. I didn't receive the waybill. I will change the review as I receive new informationUpdate November 23rd:The company has not yet provided a tracking number or waybill !  Viperatech: Please, send me the waybill, tracking number or parcel number

Review.Titre: Be careful when you buy from Viperatech!
Review.Contenu: Be careful when you buy from Viperatech!For large orders: never pay in advance!. Use insurance methods such as Pay Pall or better Letter of Credit.I had to wait for my units more then 2 months which supposed to be "on stock". I had a roller coster experience with them. I was even proposed to replace the units that I have ordered (AMD-BC160) with lower grade units overpriced. For small orders you can gamble.Overall I lost money waiting instead of purchasing these from other suppliers.

I bought from them crypto mining hardware, but the miner for which I paid a lot of money, haven't arrived till this day. I'm seeing a lot of positive reviews, but for me the case is the opposite. There is no sign of the delivery or refund. I would suggest you to be careful with these guys, as they are looking to legit to be true.. If the purchase don't arrive until the end of the week I will inform the authorities, about their malicious practices. These actions are unacceptable and their audacity must be stopped.

Scam website!! Do not order from it!!I never received the order!!!This website will not deliver me what I paid for nor will give me some sort of a refund!!I cannot initiate a refund on my own as the payment was conducted over the Bitcoin network. I hope this review will help somebody who is wondering from where to order... You should be prepared for disappointment if you do it from viperatech

To continue my last review about Viperatech.I thought I cover all but wait, there is more: After finally I got the products (65 pcs of AMD-BC160) I found out that these boards have been heavily used (lots of scratches and dust in the fans) and sold as new.  I have contacted James to inquiry about this but I could not get any reply even after I wrote a couple of emails.I strongly advise to proceed with care if you really want to buy from them.

This is my last review about Viperatech and I only post this because I saw that somebody from their side posted a response to my previous review.For the sake of truth, the statement:"You were repeatedly warned that the AMD BC-160 was a discontinued product and implored you to select an equivalent alternative" is completely false and I will explain why.I was informed 30 days later after my payment for a product that supposed to be "on stock" that the product is no longer available and I was asking for a refund but was firmly refused. Instead of refund I got a proposal for receiving lower grade units overpriced which I have declined. Finally I got the BC-160 but these are heavily used. Also I have asked for the warranty terms and still got no answer on that.Please consider these aspects on your next Viperatech purchase.

Review.Titre: I bought two ASIC miners from this…
Review.Contenu: I bought two ASIC miners from this website and I haven't received them. The payment was made with BTC and the only thing I received is an email, nothing else, no delivery, no miners, no compensation! They mean to ''sell'' profitable goods, to take your money and to leave you with nothing. I can't charged my money back, they refuse to refund me and I'm starting to think that the website is a tool for stealing and information collecting, as they have my personal details now. Very soon I will be forced to inform the authorities here and in Canada.

Review.Titre: I had decided to buy a few miners in…
Review.Contenu: I had decided to buy a few miners in order to start mining Bitcoins and make some money on the side. I saw their shop and I saw that they offer good deals. At first they said that the shipping would take up to 10 days and as nothing was delivered within two weeks, I decided to check what is going on. I asked them what was happening with the miners, however the only answer I received was that the shipping of the order was delayed within a few days. After another week had passed, it became clear that the people behind this website never had any intentions to send me my ''order'', if it even exists at all..

My order hasn't arrived! When I visited their website and saw that the wanted from me Antminer was in stock, I asked some questions and I was answered very politely. We exchanged 3-4 more mails and I was convinced in their legitimacy. Placed my order for 1 of these miners and paid with crypto, there was a sale which was awesome because I saved some money and this was more than tempting, because they had high taxes.. It has been over three weeks and there is no sign of delivery of my miner...

Orde#10751	date November 16, 2022 €2,641.86No Shopping No answer to ticket Ticket ID:1139363b38642cfcd6shop have stores on amazon, newegg and bestbuy, but prices is to high, i think is only is for people think "oh, its trusted store" and send money, but realy this no have ansver to order...

Review.Titre: I want to inform the next buyer that…
Review.Contenu: I want to inform the next buyer that this website is fraudulent. It takes money from the people and does not send the product which they have bought. I have ordered and paid for a crypto miner whcih was ''in stock'' over a month ago. To this day the product has not been delivered or refunded in any way. When I contected the website, the support was responsive and I received answers to my questions pretty fast. This thing changed soon after the purchase. The support got slow in the responding and soon all I can heard were only excuses for another delay or another ETA of delivery, in which I don't believe. I believed to the positive reviews about them here and I found out the hard way that they were lies. Don't make my mistake!

I'm still waiting for delivery... After I paid them, they just kept saying that the shipping is delayed because of something. They never told me what the reason for the delay was and just kept extending it.And I don't have any choice, but to wait more and hope that I will receive something in the end, but my hope starts to die!
I got this invoice number, SI-917 I can´t pay by paypal, I send a message to asking for your BTC wallet and nobody anwser from 26/05, today I will sent a messageagain and nobody anwser again.

Is Viperatech a scam website?? I hope not. To the Vipera guy reading this here - my Order #7602 for an Nvidia GPU CMP170HX was placed on January 4, 2022, and until now, March 1, 2022, still undelivered. Nvidia CMP170HX seems to be a problem; they offered a swap at their website. I agreed to swap the Nvidia GPU with 3 AMD BC-160; am still waiting for the delivery.  I am crossing my fingers that they are not scammers.Update:  At the Viperatech website, as of today, March 5th, 2022: "AMD XFX BC-160 74MH/s 150W1272 in stock"Now, they are supposed to ship only 3X BC-160s to me to swap for the unfulfilled order of Nvidia 170HX GPU. And they have over a thousand of these AMD GPUs "in stock"!!Well, their latest promise through this Trustpilot.com website is March 9th delivery to me "before noon". Let's wait and see. And then I will amend further this review.Update #2:Vipera, through DHL, delivered the 3x AMD BC-160 last Monday, March 7th, 2 days ahead of the March 9th schedule. I appreciate it. The GPUs have been under test for a couple of days now and seem to be performing within my expectation. So, I'd say they are acceptable. Only one minor issue left - how they will handle the refund of the small difference between what I paid for my original order of Nvidia CMP-170HX and the current price of the AMD BC-160.Conclusion: Viperatech is a legitimate online commerce business. They just sorely need an improvement in their after-sale customer support and communication - better responsiveness and transparency.

response to viperatech response.  perhaps you should not list the item as in stock and actually have it say somewhere on the page that its a preorder.  this to me feels very misleadingsecond responsefirst i am not angry but i am disappointed and this is why i only place an order for one small item with new companies i have not dealt with. second how am i as a customer suppose to know they were not released yet. listing them as in stock and shipping within ten days in no way says that it is a preorder. i could  have preordered this item from many different companies at a lower price but decided to try viperatech for the first time because you listed it as in stock unlike other companies that listed it as a preorder. i wrote the review to warn other consumers that when your items say in stock that this is not necessarily true which you could have easily just taken ownership of and fixed on future listings but preferred not to address the issue of the way it was listed but just say my order was a preorder. since that was your response i wrote my response to bring to your attention for a second time listing items that way is a misleading way of doing business in hopes you where a reputable company and take ownership of this and correct it in the future so others are not ordering in stock items that are not truly in stock but instead you are trying to shift the blame to me as your consumer.   i don't want anything from your company but the item i ordered and for you to fix your website to not have misleading information on items in the future.
Haven't received any confirmation or any type of email back or forth. Waiting for something or my money back?

Review.Titre: I did order purchase about 3 weeks ago…
Review.Contenu: I did order purchase about 3 weeks ago up to date still waiting for the invoice to complete the order!

Review.Titre: I ordered an Intel i9-10980XE which…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an Intel i9-10980XE which Vipertech listed as in stock. The funds were deducted from my account right away and the problems pretty much started right away. I was told product would ship in 7 days days after order was placed, one said shipped DDP and another said I have to deal with customs. I did not receive my order until 22Aug23.I was told " It is enroute but no tracking until it lands in your country." When I went to chat after 8 days I was told it was not shipped. Now bear it mind it more often than not took Viperatech days to reply to my questions regarding this order, asking for delivery status. After days of no replies I made a review explaining what my experience with Viperatech was like so far.Within and hour or 2 I started getting messages from Vipertech, here is the exchange:V: "Management has informed us your order is being cancelled unless you change your 1 star trustpilot review."15/8/23 7:41Me;" And how do I know if I delete my review my order will actually be shipped?" 15/8/23 7:41V: "Change it now, manager says, or they are cancelling the order is what we are told.VIPERA - 15/8/2023, 7:42Manager says this cpu was hard to find, we have paid for it from our partner in advanceWe will not fulfill your order if that review stands.Funds will be returned to you if it is not rectified.Furthermore, it was bought at a loss, $1300.Change it, or we cancel.You have 2 hours to rectify manager says. You can always put your review back up if it doesnt shipbut as it stands, they will not ship anything with that review up."Viperatech 15/8/23 7:43Now the thing about that exchange. I made the review on a Google account that is not registered with Viperatech. Another thing I would like to point out is where Viperatech in the above exchange said they paid more for the CPU and sold it to me at a loss. I checked Viperatech website for the CPU after that claim and the price went from $1,050 to $1,398. I checked the site again and it was back down to $1,050.Viperatech is not honest on what they have in stock, when/if it was shipped and are very, very slow to respond to customer questions/concerns. How would I describe my experience with Viperatech? Something between a dumpster fire and a nightmare.

Review.Titre: Error Prone, Unresponsive, Unhelpful - Stay Away
Review.Contenu: Ordered GPUs from this company for a critical business need. Specifically ordered Gigabyte RTX 3090 blower style GPUs as we needed that form factor to fit in our chassis. These are not typically available in the USA, and Vipera was the only place I could find them, so we placed an order.10/27/2022 - Order placed11/8/2022 - Email sent to check on the shipment tracking - No Response11/11/2022 - 2nd email sent to check on the shipment tracking - No response11/17/2022 - 3rd email sent to check on the shipment tracking11/17/2022 - Finally responded, order is with freight forwarder, no tracking available. But they will reach out to shipping company to get tracking info by tomorrow.11/18/2022 - It's "tomorrow" still no tracking info, Vipera never followed up.11/21/2022 - 4th email sent to check on shipment tracking11/22/2022 - Response with vague shipment information originating in Taiwan. No tracking available.49 Days Later1/10/2023 - Package finally arrives, open it to find out that they shipped the incorrect items. Instead of the NEW blower style RTX 3090s that we ordered, we received REFURBISHED triple fan RTX 3090s. Again, we needed a specific form factor for our project, so these were useless to us. The weird thing was our order was placed for Gigabyte GPUs and our shipment came directly from MSI.1/11/2023 - Email informing Vipera of their mistake. Website shows they still have 7 units in stock of the GPU that we ordered. We asked them to ship out the correct GPUs and send a return label for the GPUs we received. - No response1/26/2023 - 2nd email informing them of the mistake and trying to rectify1/31/2023 - Finally get a response, they are now out of stock of the GPU that we originally ordered and it is discontinued. They "recommended" that we "upgrade" to a to a Quadro RTX A5000 and they would only charge us the difference in cost, and additional ~$2000. How generous.No way I would offer this company any more business. Now the real question is: how long will it take to get a return label and actually get a refund?This place is a joke. They are error prone and unresponsive. Shipping takes forever. I made the mistake of selecting this as a vendor for some critical parts of an engineering project. If you are a business or large corporation looking to source hardware, stay far away from this company.If you're okay waiting 76 days for delivery, with no tracking information, and needing to email them 3-4 times before you get an unhelpful response, then go ahead and order from them.
Chat online now! Still no answer for 8 hours.

Review.Titre: scam scam scam scam scam scam
dont believe when it says in stock
Review.Contenu: ordered an item that said in stock and would be shipped with in 10 days. ordered june 26th and it is now july 10th and item has not shipped

Review.Titre: Not very accommodating to new users and…
Review.Contenu: Not very accommodating to new users and buyers. In the end they helped me out, but for the cash paid out, you’d think I’d be their biggest priority (guess they only work with big companies). My customer support could’ve been 65% better

Ordered a KS1 from them back in July, received it second week of August which was fine. The issue I have is with the snarky guy on the WhatsApp chat. I was looking to buy a KS2 and enquired about some sort of discount for returning customers. His response made it seem like I was being ridiculous for asking about a discount and so I informed him of the price I had been quoted by another vendor and I was told to “buy from them then” i said ok and did just that, I saved over $1000 buying from a different vendor. His response to this “happy for you” and then “nobody cares. We fulfill our orders. Buy from the chinese and roll the dice.” and then “when your machine breaks get ready to fix it yourself btw.” So yeah, real mature responses..

Review.Titre: Immediately fixed an issue when it came up.
Review.Contenu: Update; they got in touch pretty much immediately to say there was an obvious error on their part. I asked about delivery and the were as informative as they could be under the circumstances (stock shortages for GPU with everyone, including them). So I've amended the review back to reflect reality to date.I'll update further re delivery etc.Thought they were pretty good initially then they started sending me somewhat threatening invoices/letters multiple times for items I had paid in advance for.

Received my miner pretty quick. Had some trouble getting any response with an issue which was very frustrating. Then tried to place another order with no response. But they finally did get a hold of them and resolved the issue. Ships Direct from China, So They do not ship out of Canada like I thought.Overall Ok, Could use major improvements, but Seems common in the Crypto world.

I ordered a S19J Pro+ on December 13th because the website said they had a bunch in stock. I made this review because I have yet to receive any updates on my order and have read through some reviews saying they have not received their order, so i am a little concerned. I sent an email to them asking for an update December 15th and received a quick response saying it would take a 2 business day delay from when you place the order until you receive tracking, and then it is scanned shortly afterwards by DHL. Also noted that they are shipping from Hong Kong, which I can understand since thats probably where they are made. As of Dec 18th I have not received a tracking ID or any updates. I will give them the benefit of the doubt that they are busy because of the holidays but I am still expecting a shipping label to be given to me for tracking today or tomorrow, or I will begin to be worried. I will update my review once I receive a tracking ID on my order, and will update once again if/once I have received my package.Edit 1.) Dec 19th still no update, shipping label or tracking id provided.Edit 2.) Dec 20th Got an email that tracking label will be scanned shortly and got the tracking label itself.Edit 3.) Dec 21st label is scanned and estimated arrival time is Dec 27th.

Review.Titre: I checked on the status of my order
Review.Contenu: I checked on the status of my order. I got my update quickly. If something bad happens from here, I'll update my rating accordingly. Once I receive my order, I will update this rating to 5 stars.

Review.Titre: I purchased a Bitmain KS3 from Viperatech
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Bitmain Antminer KS3 from Viperatech, there was a slight delay with shipping. We communicated through the online chat and email, with a little back and forth Viperatech worked with the freight forwarding company to resolve any of the delays. Overall my experience was good.

I made the third purchase with Viperatech, they have not delivered my merchandise but I received an offer from the seller to contact the bank and request a refund. I am waiting to receive my money back and that is why I am updating my comment.

I made purchase for Antminer S19k pro on May 13, 2023 using Amazon prime credit card.  After the purchase I realized this was a mistake. I called next business day and was told would talk to supervisor and cancel purchase and reverse charge.  They have strict policy on cancellations, which is understandable and couldn't go against policy.  They did reach out and offer another product that was enough upgrade so it worked out.  Great customer service and understanding mistakes happen and policies are enforced.  Before you hit button make sure your ready to make the purchase.
Only thing I didn't  really like was the lack of visibility on my order as I did not make an account at your site.

Great pre sales customer service. Quick to reply to emails and instant messages. Provided good advice on which product to buy. Only downside, and Ive done 3 orders with them now in spite of it, is no email after purchase to confirm the order, and no correspondence at all for a couple weeks after the order until I get an email from the shipping company saying it’s going to arrive soon. Every other company sends an email with details on the order and another email when it ships. Wish Vipera did too.

Easy purchase and purchase options. Just wish the order status system was more specific about where order is at in the process. I’ve ordered three items and received them but it still says the items are “processing” not “shipped” or “delivered”.

I purchased the miner from them and the shipment was real quick and they also answered all the related questions before buying. Covered all the shipment expenses including customs. There was some problem with the miner upon arrival due to which i had to send it back for repair and vipera assisted me on this pretty well and also covered expenses to ship it back to bitmain. Overall I had a good experience with them and was also satisfied with their after sale services.

I found Vipera when I was looking for a 4090 graphics card and none were available anywhere besides ebay at huge markups. I was a little hesitant to order as they suspiciously showed cards in stock at high quantities. After placing my order, the company was very responsive to my emails and calls about when my order would ship etc. Thanks to Vipera I managed to get a good deal on a 4090 much better than Ebay scalpers. My one grievance is that the quantities they show in stock don't seem to be accurate. They showed in stock on 10/18 but didn't actually end up getting stock for my order until 11/1. Overall, solid purchase experience. There isn't a lot of 3rd party info online about this company, but I hope this review helps convince people they are legit.

Communication was a bit slow which is a bit to be expected dealing internationally. Communication ended up being across three different mediums which mean the thread was lost a little bit, but wasn't too bad. Package arrived much earlier than expected and without any warning, which was strange.
The sales process was fantastic. Contract was fair and price was good as well. Overal a very good experience. The deliver process wasn't so good. But it all worked out at the end.

I got the asic In top shape It was two to three days late this time One of the respondents was with little patience for asking a questionIn the end, I got my stuff I will buy from them again for sure!

Review.Titre: unfortunately I had to add 130 € in…
Review.Contenu: unfortunately I had to add 130 € in customs taxes even if it had to be all included
Shipped the product, but was a bit slow shipping.
Prices good. Shipped to canada. Wanted a D7, didn't get for 2 months, ended up with a bitcoin miner.

Update 2:Vipera credited $1,500 to the next order. I got a new tracking of the parts today (Apr 10) and it seems to be arriving this week. Update 1:Vipera agreed on $1,500 credit for the next purchase. There is a problem with the promo code they provided.Original Review:This review is for order #12992 brand new Bitmain Antminer 110t. I used $500 credit that I received from a previous order. I paid for a brand new price miner and received a used miner. I have been trying to resolve the issues with Vipera for over a month. They did not want to accept return/refund and kept twisting things around like a car salesman. I have been holding off writing a review, giving them enough chances. Viepra's dishonesty forced me to file an Amazon A-z claim and write this review. Vipera told me a few days after the order was placed that the brand new 110t was discontinued and would "upgrade" me to a cheaper 122t without refunding the difference. Even though the 122t is newer and more powerful, I refused it because the 122t's voltage is not compatible with my electricity. I asked them to cancel the order and refund. Vipera insisted that they would sort out a new 110t for me. At that time, there was refurbished 110t miners came out to the market. I asked them what they were sending. They confirmed that the one on the way was a brand new one. After waiting for 3 weeks, a badly used miner arrived. The shipping box had no Bitmain tape on it. I was shocked when I opened and tested it. The PSU is rusted everywhere that they had to sand it out. The SD card slot does not work. And, the worst was the longer shell with a fake 110t serial number sticker. The shell is an inch longer than the normal 110t and it wouldn't fit on my cooling rack. The miner is sitting there doing nothing for weeks while resolving issues with Viepra. I have lost the opportunity to mine for several hundred dollars. The used miner probably costs no more than $1,700 and I paid $3,200 for it -- a $1,500 difference.After letting Vipera know about the defects, they said they would send parts (I had to replace them myself). I did not get a confirmation of what they would send or any tracking number. There was no response from Vipera when I asked if they would send a replacement PSU. I had to go through Amazon to get a reply from them. On March 28, they said, "A new PSU, control board and shell has already been dispatched to you". Today, March 30, they gave me a DHL tracking. The tracking status is just "Shipment information received on March 30".I asked Vipera many times for a return/refund. I'm not going to pay a brand new price for a used miner even if everything is working with 1 year warranty. This used miner is about 2-3 years old and probably has only 1-2 years of life left. I still have to spend hours replacing and troubleshooting the broken parts. I gave them another option for a credit to keep the used miner and I would continue to do business with them with 2 more miners (brand new different model), but no response from Viepra. They only replied after I filed an A-z Amazon claim. They offered $1,000 credit, which means I would be paying $2,200 for a used machine and I have to buy more miners at full price in order to use the credit. I told them I wouldn't buy a used one for more than $1,800. If Viepra thinks the used machine is worth more than that, by all means, please take it and give me a refund.Today, they sent me another email asking me to withdraw the claim. They insisted on giving me $1,000 credit and told me that the cost of the parts plus shipping is $703 as if the parts were brand new and I was responsible for the defects. I'm pretty sure the parts they are sending are used and cost them almost nothing except the shipping, and I'm obviously not going to be responsible for them. I might as well claim a thousand dollars on the replacing parts labor and loss of mining opportunity.I own a business and the last thing I want to do is to ruin a business with a negative review. But I have spent enough time trying to resolve issues with them. All I got was shady car salesman bait-and-switch responses from Vipera.

Review.Titre: The were in contact with me always...
Review.Contenu: They were in contact with me always...
Fair shipping times, good support.

Customer service was on point. When I placed my order I paid for expedited shipping. When my order did not arrive in the time frame I expected I have contacted their customer service. They were able to push it through right away and in addition upgraded me to a higher hashrate miner. Yes shipping still took several weeks but that was outside of Viperatech Control. On their end they have resolved my issue right away and made me feel better about the delay by offering slightly better product. Thank you for positive first time experience with your company. I am always a bit weary purchasing Asics from a new vendor.

Hello, thank you very much for 9.4TH, it finally arrived. Communication by email and normal telephone was rather difficult, but I experienced very fast and good communication on WhatsApp. We received a tracking number via email, which to this day has the same status as "Shipment information received HONG KONG - HONG KONG SAR, CHINA", but we received the normal one on WhatsApp. For a week and a half, we were afraid that nothing would happen to our package, but then it arrived very quickly.Thanks Viperatech!

Review.Titre: Made the process easy and fast
Review.Contenu: This is my first time ordering an asic.  I picked this site because it accepted credit cards.  I ordered an asic for the November Batch (15-30th) on November 20th, and it was delivered on November 26th.  I had many questions as I'm new to mining so the support chat was very helpful and they told me exactly what I needed.
Took some time to receive my KS3 but not Viperatech’s fault order went somewhat smoothly … overall  good experience would do business again.
Outstanding Team of Workers- Very helpful and our products were always communicated about throughout the process from ordering to delivery

I put in my purchase of the miner oct 29, 2023.The item was delivered nov 28th, 2023 as promised. I will definitely will continue my purchase’s through this company. Thank for your service and prompt response!Great experience!Respectfully, James Nardi

Review.Titre: Ordered a very in demand asic
Review.Contenu: Ordered a very in demand asic, they shipped it as soon as they got possession. Every time I called for an update they were always there. Price was a little high but overall a good experience.

Review.Titre: This was my second order I’ve placed
Review.Contenu: This was my second order I’ve placed. As always customer service was excellent and my transaction was perfect. This was not a low dollar transaction either so service is even more important.
Excellent service and fast shipping! Vipera also has the best prices!
Shipped ahead of time - above and beyond expectations... won't be ordering from anyone else within North America due to the ease of the process and their reliability.
This was my 5th order with Vipera and as always the order was sent in a timely manner and received in good working order.  I will continue to use Vipera as my preferred vendor.

Great experience, it was my first time purchasing from Viperatech. It was a new vendor to me, and I was slightly nervous. I ordered several KS0 units, they arrived earlier than expected and with zero issues or hassles!Highly recommended, they were also fast to respond via the online chat!
Vipera got my ASIC to me quickly and effectively - ahead of the projected time. Shipping was perfect.
Everything went well. Miner delivered before the expectation and running well.

Review.Titre: Placed the order for my miner
Review.Contenu: Placed the order for my miner. Smooth process and customer service available to respond to questions.Good prices and lots of choices.
experience was quite good, after ordering my product came quite quickly!
Purchase from Ecuador, the miner arrived on time and perfect condition. Recommended.__________________Compra desde ecuador, el minero llegó a tiempo y en perfecto estado. Recomendado.

I ordered an IceRiver KS3M miner and received an email regarding my order.  My item was to be shipped from the factory overseas in the order in which orders were received.  However, I rather quickly had a notice from DHL that the parcel was on the way.  I received my order much earlier than expected.   Communication was great with James.  Answered all my questions quickly.

Review.Titre: Viperatech is legit but takes patience.
Review.Contenu: US company location.  Can pay with cryptocurrency.  Like all ASICs you generally have to prepay for a nonexistent product that doesn’t get drop-shipped from China for 2 to 3 months which does suck.  That being said Viperatech is trustworthy and so is Jasminer which is a huge plus!
They get 5 stars because I received the item I ordered. Customer service is sub-par...

Review.Titre: Solid company - order arrived in 2 weeks
Review.Contenu: Solid company. I ordered 5 ASICs to a friends house while I was out of state for work, and everything arrived within 2 weeks. Separate shipments due to some customs delays in the US (2 got stuck in LA for a few days) but nevertheless they all arrived via DHL while I tracked the delays. They are currently up and running as advertised. Expect to receive a Purchasing Agreement from them. Initially had some issues with PayPal (likely on my end since it was a new account), so I ended up wiring the payment with no issue. Reckless? Perhaps...however, the fact that they have an active PayPal account and offer that as a payment method assured me that they are legit - and they are. Suzanne, Maggie and Mark were all very helpful whether it was over the phone or via email during the process. I'm not sure why there are 1 star reviews with people claiming they're scammers. They aren't. I'm planning to make another order with them, and recommend for anyone that might be skeptical of some of the competitors out there.
Purchased several Nvidia CMP-170HX cards. One was operating at low efficiency  . Spoke to rep on chat and they are RMAing the card now. Fast and courteous support.
I have purchased 8 mining systems and had delivery questions and I had a response within a couple hours. This company has it all. Keep it up!
Had to email and online chat regarding questions about my order and was response was quick and professional. Based on customer service alone I will continue to purchase from them.

I have purchased Bitcoin ASIC miners from Viperatech on at least 8 different occasions, and they always come through quickly and efficiently. Plus, as far as I can tell, their prices are better than competitive.
Great communication and customer service. Worked to gove us the best options for our business and needs and have everything delivered quickly and efficiently. Would and are using in the future.

On 10/19/2022 I ordered a Gigabyte RTX 4090 gpu from this company as it was the only retailer that allowed me to order at a decent price. I was worried about this website at first because I’d never heard of it before and I saw 1 or 2 negative reviews online. So I was wondering when I would get my $2000 GPU after a week of not receiving it. After some back and forth with customer service. I was told it would be shipped a week later as their supply was less than they anticipated. Again after another week I still hadn’t received any shipping info for my product. After a final call they told me they still hadn’t received enough Gigabyte GPUs so they offered to send me a Zotac AMP Extreme Airo GPU for the same price which is a slight upgrade. Sure enough 5 days later I got my GPU on 11/14/2022. Everything seems to be running great and I’m super relieved and happy! This website is definitely legit, just keep in mind it’s probably a smaller tech company and you may need to use their customer service and be patient.

Update 2:Viperatech went above and beyond to replace the used units with brand-new ones for free. It took a while but I received them. The two brand-new units came in the original Bitmain boxes from HK. The Bitmain boxes were delivered dented but the units were not damaged due to thick foam insulation. I wish they put the Bitmain box in another box to conceal the content. Overall, I'm satisfied with the purchase from Viperatech. The pricing at Viperatech is probably the best out there.   You do not need to worry about import duties and taxes. The shipping takes time but it will come. Update 1:I'm updating this review with 3 stars since they have responded and are trying to resolve the issues.Viperatech responded on Jan 19 and offered to replace the two miners with brand-new ones. The shipments are being delayed because of the Chinese New Year. They said, "freight forwarders will return to work on Jan 29th." I will update the review again once I receive the shipment confirmation.Original Review:The product was described as "Used - Canada Stock" but it was shipped from Hong Kong. Viperatech refused to cancel the shipment. The items came in bad condition and one of them is not working. They have not responded to my messages.

Review.Titre: I have had horrible experiences with…
Review.Contenu: I have had horrible experiences with miner purchases. I was referred to Viperatech.  I couldn't be happier.  Delivery was a little late but they always remain in contact and kept me informed.  Extremely helpful.
High reliability, good handling, and fast deliveryEverything was very goodThank you very much Viperatech

I’ve read some negative reviews for Viperatech on other review sites, and I made an account here just to set the record straight and say those are probably all shills trying to take business away from Vipera! So yes, it doesn’t matter if I only have 1 review. I don’t do reviews on trust pilot, except this one. Not sure if I’ll do more.Anyway, I ordered 2 crypto mining ASICs for a total of about $8000. Vipera is listed as a trusted retailer on ASIC Miner Value, so I decided to ignore the bad reviews and give them a shot. The ASICs arrived in 7 days from the time I submitted the order! I did pay for expedited shipping, but that’s still pretty fast from Hong Kong, taking into account customs. Which was all included in the price of the ASICs, by the way. And yes, I guess they do drop ship direct from the source sometimes, which is fine by me. It means a lower price and the assurance that the product is brand spanking new, which they were. I was able to set the miners up that day and they work flawlessly. Some reviews state that they don’t reply to emails often, but that’s understandable if you take into account that it seems like they are a large distributor moving a lot of tech for a lot of clients. If you research Viperatech, they have stores all over the world, and they all look extremely high tech. Unless you think AI or CGI has advanced to ridiculous levels, I have no idea why some people are even considering Vipera a scam. All of their addresses for all their stores and contact info is listed on their site, including phone numbers. It’s easy enough to verify their legitimacy. You can see for yourself with a little googling that they are a multinational operation, so replying to emails from individuals may be a little difficult. But, rest assured, when they do reply, it’s honest, and to the point. You don’t have to worry, you’ll get your stuff. I got a text from DHL with tracking, and they even arrived a day early!Time is money with crypto mining, so thank you very much James, and Viperatech, for the excellent service and lightning fast processing and shipping!
Once again Viperatech has served me very well by delivering my order within the agreed time frame. Great service!

Review.Titre: I ordered an antminer L7 from viper…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an antminer L7 from viperatech, material well received! I recommend this company!!! they are very serious and reliablej'ai commander un antminer L7 chez viperatech, materiel bien recu! je recommande cette entreprise!!! il sont trés serieux et fiable

At first I was nervous due to the negative reviews left for them, but i decided to buy through them anyways as they were located in Canada and also I had the option to pay with credit card which provided buyer protection if anything were to go wrong.   So In my experience, i bought an L7 Antminer from them, i paid with credit card on 10.29.2022, expecting it would ship in a few days, when it didn't i got worried, I messaged their customer support on 11.10.2022 who replied really quickly and said there would be a delay because they sold out the day i placed the order due to a recent Doge/LTC rally, which was odd to me because there was no mention of that when i placed my order, but they did give me an option to cancel my order and get a refund but i decided to stick with it so I waited.(I did feel like they should have messaged their customers directly to let them know of any delays for high value items, i had to message them to find out about the delay after 10 days of already making the purchase, but that is just my opinion)   Then on 11.19.2022 i recieved my tracking number and the package was delivered safely on 12.01.2022in secure packaging and in brand new condition.   Their customer service was a little strange but helpful. Overall i had a positive experience with them and will be coming back.
